availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William O. Bradley (Somerset, Pulaski County, first Republican Governor of Kentucky (1895-1899))

body.p: Somerset, Pulaski County, first Republican Governor of Kentucky (1895-1899). Kentucky native. Son of Robert M. Bradley and Nancy Ellen Totten Bradley. Married Margaret R. Duncan in 1867. Resident in Boyle County, Kentucky in 1850. Resident in Somerset, Pulaski County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle County, District 2, p. 720. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pulaski County, Somerset, p. 152. Find A Grave, "William Oâ€™Connell Bradley (March 23, 1914- May 23, 1914)," Memorial #6864793, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6864793 (accessed May 22, 2019). John E. Kleber eds., The Kentucky Encyclopedia (Lexington, KY: The University Press of Kentucky, 1992), 112, (accessed via Google books).
